attributes.action: scrap the forthcoming super league licensing therefore providing more competiton amongst fans and players
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Super league licensing is scheduled to enter in 2009. This means teams will be given entry to super league based on their fanbase, turnover, stadium etc instead of how well they play. As super league is dominated by 5/6 teams this gives other teams ie. Harlequins, Wakefield, Huddersfield nothing to play for, sign this petition and scrap licensing!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
